text: "Be My Baby" is a song written by Jeff Barry, Ellie Greenwich, and Phil Spector. It was recorded on July 5, 1963 at Gold Star Studios Hollywood by American girl group the Ronettes.Phil Spector: Back to MONO (1958-1969) ABKCO Records, 1991, liner notes It was released as a single in August 1963 and was also on their 1964 debut album Presenting the Fabulous Ronettes featuring Veronica. Phil Spector produced the song, and was a well-known example of the "wall of sound" style of production that Spector was famous for. ==References== Category:1963 songs Category:Pop songs Category:R&B; songs Category:The Ronettes songs Category:The Beach Boys songs Category:Jody Miller songs
title: Be My Baby
